headlines.description: Arsenal held on for a scrappy 1-0 win over Bournemouth after dominating much of the first half.
headlines.shortLinkText: David Luiz seals scrappy win over Bournemouth

headlines.description: Manchester City suffered a damaging 2-0 defeat to Wolves at the Etihad Stadium on Sunday as they saw their Premier League title hopes slip away.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man City suffer shock home defeat to Wolves

headlines.description: Chelsea won back-to-back Premier League games under Frank Lampard for the first time with a 4-1 win at Southampton.
headlines.shortLinkText: Abraham, Mount see Chelsea past Southampton

headlines.description: Manchester United endured another dismal away day after losing 1-0 to Newcastle United at St James' Park on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Abysmal Man United lose at Newcastle
